mapper.select: SELECT id_ AS `id`, rev_ AS `rev`, proc_def_id_ AS `proc_def_id`, proc_inst_id_ AS `process_instance_id`, execution_id_ AS `execution_id`, act_id_ AS `activity_id`, task_id_ AS `task_id`, call_proc_inst_id_ AS `call_proc_inst_id`, act_name_ AS `activity_name`, act_type_ AS `activity_type`, assignee_ AS `assignee`, start_time_ AS `start_time`, end_time_ AS `end_time`, transaction_order_ AS `transaction_order`, duration_ AS `duration`, delete_reason_ AS `delete_reason`, tenant_id_ AS `tenant_id` FROM act_hi_actinst aha WHERE aha.proc_inst_id_ = #{procInstId} AND aha.act_type_ != 'sequenceFlow' LIMIT 500;
